official-title.#text: To require notifications by the Secretary of Health and Human Services to Congress and to individuals of breaches of personally identifiable information of such individuals maintained, submitted to, or submitted by a system maintained by Exchanges under the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act, and for other purposes.
